Service Schedule Manager

• Single-file HTML app for small service businesses (plumbers, electricians, cleaners) to manage client appointments and service requests
• Main view displays a weekly calendar grid (Mon–Sun) with time slots (8 AM–6 PM); each slot shows scheduled services with client name and service type
• Add new service: form fields for client name, phone, service type (dropdown: Plumbing, Electrical, Cleaning, Other), date, time, duration (30 min to 4 hours), and notes
• Drag-and-drop services between time slots to reschedule; click to edit or delete any service
• Full keyboard navigation: Tab through form fields, Enter to add service, arrow keys to navigate calendar, Delete key to remove selected service
• Undo/Redo stack (up to 20 actions): Ctrl+Z for undo, Ctrl+Y for redo; display undo/redo button states at top
• Color-code services by type (Plumbing=blue, Electrical=yellow, Cleaning=green, Other=gray) for quick visual scanning
• Search bar to filter services by client name or phone number in real time
• Export week as plain text (client name, time, service type, notes) via button
• Persist all services to browser localStorage; auto-load on page refresh
• Responsive single-column layout on mobile (stack calendar vertically); desktop shows full grid
• Simple, clean design with high contrast text, large touch targets (min 44px), and clear labels per accessibility best practices
• Status indicator at top showing total services this week and next available slot
